ok guys sorry, it wouldnt let me log in for a long time, had to reset everything. umm you should be able to view them perfectly by having the newest version of the k-lite codec pack, also playing them with vlc, if explorer crashes find out which episode is causing it and re-download it, chances are that it got corrupted while you were downloading, scanning the file generally works for that. if it still wont play my only advice is to use 'any video converter' and convert the files to AVI or MKV with xvid compression and keeping the resolution the same. hope this helps and sorry for the super delay :D
